oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Eesti Keele Instituudi tekstikorpus
The Text Corpus of the Institute of the Estonian Language
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hein, Indrek
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: EKI tekstikorpus on koostatud juhuslikult kogutud materjalist (10,4 miljonit sõnavormi; u 80% ulatuses ajalehetekstid) ja pole seega 'representatiivne'. Ka ei ole korpus märgendatud, sobides eelkõige leksikaalse materjali otsinguks.

The material for the text corpus has been collected haphazardly, (10.4 million word forms; ca 80% of the texts come from newspapers), which is why the corpus is not representative. Nor is the corpus tagged, thus being suited for lexical search mainly.
